# Field trip {-}

While in London explore some geo-spatial sites of historical importance...

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(leaflet)
library(readxl)

data <- read_excel("assets/places.xlsx")


places <- leaflet(height=400, width=500) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.PositronNoLabels) %>% 
  setView(lng = -0.03, lat = 51.5, zoom = 10) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(data = data,
                   lng = ~Long,
                   lat = ~Lat,
                   color = 'midnightblue',
                   popup = ~paste0("<b>", Place, "</b><br>",
                                   "<a href='", URL, "' target='_blank'>", URL, "</a>"))
places


```
